anime.description: Killed by a landmine, a soul of a young peasant Taro rose up to the celestial world where he found love with an angelic beauty. Reincarnated without losing the memory of his previous life, one day Taro meets a girl with a striking resemblance of his celestial lover... and this coincidence throws Taro`s fate into a completely different path altogether... The first Masalanimation ever, an exotic mix of animation with Masala flavour!

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
